instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00143: What is 820-00143? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00143</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> GPU issues?
threads.message:
Sometimes the MacBook starts up and works fine, some other times it boot loops and shows lines on the screen, board looks clean, could this be a bad GPU?

If it was a bad GPU any good sources for getting good NEW chips?

threads.title: MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00143</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> GPU issues?
threads.message: Any reference for the lines on the screen? Could be screen or GPU depending on symptoms

threads.title: MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00143</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> GPU issues?
threads.message: If same issue on external monitor, then GPU, or vRAM...

threads.title: MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00143</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> GPU issues?
threads.message: Well right now the MacBook is not starting up any more, it turns on but after about 10-30 seconds after the chime it restarts and repeats.

threads.title: MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00143</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> GPU issues?
MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00143</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> GPU issues?
threads.message: Ordered new chip, lets see how it goes
